mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTENDANCE (ATTNO, USERNAME, ATTDATE, ATTIN, ATTSTATE) VALUES (NULL, #{username}, CAST(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 9 HOUR)AS date), #{attIn}, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE USERNAME = #{username} AND ATTDATE = CAST(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 9 HOUR)AS date)

SELECT A.*, E.EMPNAME, E.STATE, P.POSITIONNAME, D.DEPTNAME FROM ATTENDANCE A INNER JOIN EMP E ON A.USERNAME = E.USERNAME INNER JOIN POSITION P ON E.POSITIONNO = P.POSITIONNO INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPTNO = D.DEPTNO ORDER BY ATTIN IS NOT NULL DESC, ATTIN DESC, CASE WHEN ASCII(SUBSTRING(E.EMPNAME, 1, 1)) < 123 THEN 2 ELSE 1 END, E.EMPNAME
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 9 HOUR), '%Y') FROM DUAL
SELECT DAYOFFCOUNT FROM EMP WHERE USERNAME = #{username}
SELECT E.*, P.POSITIONNAME, D.DEPTNAME FROM EMP E INNER JOIN POSITION P ON E.POSITIONNO = P.POSITIONNO INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPTNO = D.DEPTNO
